entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -35.7°C
Wind: WSW 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
